description:
Mad Maks is a fun 3D arcade shooting game. As the pilot of your battle vehicle, your need to defend your units and dodge waves of enemy attack in order to deliver your forces to victory!

There are 10 exciting stages with 3 modes of difficulty. You must complete one stage to in order to unlock the next. Once all 10 stages are completed, you can test your skills in Hard mode. Your performance in each stage will decide the number of Bonus Stars awarded which will unlock the Challenge games. Play the Challenge games to hone in your shooting and dodging abilities.

An online multiplayer version and new stages will be available in the future so stay tuned!

Unique features of the game:
•Fast and furious game play
•10 exciting battle stages, with 3 different difficulty modes
•Rich 3D battle terrain and special effects
•Pilot different battle vehicles against varying enemy units
•5 Challenge Games
